name: Gun Shoot Bottle
description:
Starting levels are easy to play but gradually the game will become difficult to play. Highly recommended for fun loving shooter and those who are looking for real bottle shooting simulation game.

How to Play
- Shoot to win
- Aim and smash the bottle
- Be accurate while shooting
- Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
- Move left & right to shoot more bottles

Features:
- Smooth UI.
- Simple and Addictive Game play.
- Extended Shooting experience.
- Game for all ages.
- It is free, Play and Enjoy Bottle Shoot game.
